title: (x) Swatch logo - custom designed {James}
content:
Is Swatch logo a custom work? Does anyone know a similar font?   
thanks in advance ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080401010252im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/47857.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Fremont Presbyterian Church - Schneidler Initials, Erazure {Marc O, Mike Y}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080401010252/http:/www.typophile.com/node/6444 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Lou Reed's "Rock n Roll Animal" cover - Informal Gothic {Jan} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080401010252/http:/www.typophile.com/node/6436 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mariano

comments.content: This is custom. However, you can get a font that replicates the look [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20080401010252/http:/www.dafont.com/en/search.php?nq=1&q=swatch&Submit=+Go+).
